org.hkijena.acaq5.extensions.imagejalgorithms.ij1.measure

Class ImageStatisticsParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.acaq5.extensions.imagejalgorithms.ij1.measure.ImageStatisticsParameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ACAQParameterCollection

    public class ImageStatisticsParameters
extends Object
implements ACAQParameterCollection
    Encapsulates parameters that are related to Analyzer, as this should not be outside the control of ACAQ5 to prevent issues. Those measurements are also used by RoiManager.
